name: Boba Pup: Demo
description:
Boba Pup: Demo is a point & click 3d story-based game. You play as Cho - the chihuahua who was just hired for their first day at the Boba Pup Shop. The demo starts with Cho 's day at home. Join us and Cho with their morning tea, fresh flowers, and taking a moment to enjoy the day.

Design, Concept & Art : https://luui-arts.itch.io/

Programming : https://noahm1216.itch.io/
